definition[0]: genetically modified foods or plants have had their genetic structure changed so that they are not affected by particular diseases or harmful insects
definition[1]: genetically-modified foods and plants have had their GENETIC (=the materials that control the development of particular qualities) structure changed so that they are not affected by certain diseases or harmful insects
example[0]: Consumers are turning their backs on genetically-modified ingredients, and demanding organic products.
example[1]: It became the first store to refuse to stock genetically-modified produce.
